reviewText: No action, mostly conversations between hunters.  Very disappointing DVD,  Should be more actual hunting. I would not recommend this DVD to new boar hunters.

I thoroughly enjoyed this dvd as the hunts were really exhilarating. In it, it ranges from hunting havalinas to wild boar to exotic African brush pigs (which were really bizarre looking). The people in the dvd also added on to the excitement with insightful details that you otherwise wouldn't known. Overall, a really great deal.

I loved this dvd. The filming was very good quality, and some very very exciting hunts. But some viewers might not be too keen on some of the more graphic hunts. (the one with the dogs hunting down the feral pig come to mind). I can't really see that bothering the type of person who would buy this video in the first place but nowadays you never know. I feel you can't go wrong with this purchase.
